Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.effects

Contains classes supporting visual effects such as blurs, reflections, and drop shadows.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Decorator Interface defining a component "decorator".
TransitionListener Transition listener interface.
 

Class Summary
BaselineDecorator Displays a component's baseline.
BlurDecorator Decorator that applies a blur to a component.
ClipDecorator Decorator that adds a rectangular region to the current clip.
DropShadowDecorator Decorator that adds a drop shadows to a component.
FadeDecorator Decorator that applies an opacity to a component.
FadeTransition Fade transition class.
GrayscaleDecorator Decorator that applies a grayscale conversion to a component.
OverlayDecorator Decorator that overlays a component on top of another component.
ReflectionDecorator Decorator that paints a reflection of a component.
RotationDecorator Decorator that rotates a component about its center.
SaturationDecorator Decorator that modifies the color saturation of a component.
ScaleDecorator Decorator that scales the painting of a component along the X and/or Y axes.
ShadeDecorator Decorator that applies a "shade" to a component.
TagDecorator Decorator that allows a caller to attach a "tag" visual to a component.
Transition Abstract base class for "transitions", which are animated application effects.
TranslationDecorator Decorator that translates the paint origin of its component.
WatermarkDecorator Decorator that paints a watermark effect over a component.
 

Package org.apache.pivot.wtk.effects Description

Contains classes supporting visual effects such as blurs, reflections, and drop shadows.
